subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Tuck, a defensive end who helped the Giants win two Super Bowls and spent 11 seasons in the N.F.L., compiling 66½ sacks, said he was retiring.
snippet: Tuck, a defensive end who helped the Giants win two Super Bowls and spent 11 seasons in the N.F.L., compiling 66½ sacks, said he was retiring.
